_header: Who here his foot set open the sorrow
_description: On stepping on unsafe ground, in a Latin sermon — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
ho her hys fot set opene þe sorwaȝbote hys schon wete a red
                    me þys saȝe
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 69.
